description:
Implement full-text search using PostgreSQL tsvector/tsquery or dedicated engine (Meilisearch, Typesense). Support fuzzy matching, typo tolerance, faceted filtering, and relevance ranking. Expose via paginated API with highlight snippets. Add search analytics (popular queries, no-result queries).

**Rationale:** Users expect fast, forgiving search as dataset grows. Exact-match queries frustrate users who misremember terms. Search analytics reveal content gaps and UX issues. Essential for apps with >100 searchable entities.
